Splitwise calculating issue: I use Splitwise with my partner. I just recalculated after using Splitwise for around 5 months. & i found out that the amount was 36 cent higher on Splitwise than it was supposed to be. Reason: when splitting uneven amounts it rounds and in total it's wrong by 0.5 cents(0.95 cents will be splitted 48 cents for everyone, in total 96 cents)This may not be a lot if it happens one time but using it over years could mean that it is wrong by maybe 10 euros.
